```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(tidytext)
library(here)
library(LexisNexisTools)
library(sentimentr)
library(readr)
library(textreadr)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
text_lnt <- lnt_read(c("data/pollinators_nexis_1-100.docx", "data/pollinators_nexis_101-200.docx"))

text_df <- lnt_convert(text) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(!c(section, edition, graphic)) %>% 
  mutate(article = tolower(article))

text_df$article <- gsub("[[:digit:][:punct:]]", "", text_df$article)

words <- text_df %>% 
  select(date, headline, article) %>% 
  unnest_tokens(output = word, input = article, token = 'words')
```
